Texts.Chs:
强壮的爬虫类人。具有弹性，十分灵活，在陆地和水下都能茁壮成长。
两栖的生活增加了它们的能量储备，但是它们不如陆生爬行动物强壮。

^orange;食性^reset;：杂食性，包括生肉

^orange;天赋^reset;：
最大饱腹度x^green;1.4^reset;, 防御x^green;1.05^reset;
  抗性: ^green;+40%^reset;毒素抗性, ^green;+10%^reset;射线抗性,^green;+10%^reset;辐射康熙
^green;+1100^reset;氧气, 游泳加速.
免疫: 毒素

^orange;环境^reset;：
  沼泽，湿地和诡之海生物群落
    HPx^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;%速度

^orange;武器^reset;:
  矛: 伤害&防御x^green;1.1^reset;
  短矛: 伤害x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;%暴击伤害
  弩/鱼叉: 伤害x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;%暴击伤害

^red;弱点^reset;:
  HPx^red;0.88^reset;, 能量x^red;0.95^reset;
  抗性: -^red;40^reset;% 寒气抗性, -^red;20^reset;% 电系抗性
Texts.Eng:
Sturdy reptilian people. They are resilient and agile, with the ability to thrive both on land and underwater. Amphibious life has increased their natural energy stores, but they are less hardy than land-based reptiles.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, But can eat Raw Meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Max Food x^green;1.4^reset;, Defense x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Poison, +^green;10^reset;% Cosmic & Radioactive
  +^green;1100^reset; Oxygen, Swim Boost.
  ^green;0.1^reset;% Health Regen
  Immunity: Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Bog, Swamp, and Strange Sea biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Speed

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Spears: Damage & Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Short Spears: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  Crossbows/Harpoons: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.88^reset;, Energy x^red;0.95^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Ice, -^red;20^reset;% Electric
